title: Started Early Go east old man

content.question: Jackson’s use of the phrase “Go east, old man” at the beginning of the eighth paragraph expresses

choices.label: gentle self-mockery about his age and the enterprise he has undertaken
honest confusion about the direction in which he needs to travel
deep regret that he is unable to find a place to call home
a comic reluctance to follow through with a mission

content.answer: gentle self-mockery about his age and the enterprise he has undertaken

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
